itemDescription: Welsh rugby union and rugby league footballer

wikipedia_page.main: Edward Jones (birth unknown – death unknown), also known by the nicknames of "Ned" or "Neddy"/"Naddy" , was a Welsh rugby union and professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1900s and 1910s. He played representative level union (RU) for Glamorgan, and at club level Pontycymmer RFC, Bryncethin RFC and Maesteg RFC, and representative level rugby league (RL) for Wales, and at club level for Wigan (Heritage No. 170), and Broughton Rangers, as a scrum-half, i.e. number 7.
